A desert wolf is a type of wolf that is located in the Kharidian Desert. Players who wish to kill desert wolves should bring waterskins or wear an enchanted water tiara to avoid damage from thirst and possibly death. The desert wolf is relatively easy to defeat, being a low level monster. It is quite abundant in the Kharidian Desert, so if you do not wish to fight it, just run away. Better yet, use the Magic Carpet service to get away from monsters. They are aggressive to players level 55 and below. Anyone under its level should be extremely careful and make sure they have plenty of water skins and food, you should note that the desert beyond the Shantay Pass is under the thirst effect. Use caution fighting these in the desert at a low level; higher levels should not have to worry.

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!

    • Rebalanced several low level monsters that were harder to kill than intended
  • update 14 April 2003 (Update):
